title: Almir Velagić
text:
Almir Velagić (born 22 August 1981) is a <a href="Bosnians">Bosnian</a> <a href="Germany">German</a> <a href="weightlifter">weightlifter</a> competing in the +105 kg category.
Velagić became German citizen in 2000.
He competed for Germany in <a href="Weightlifting%20at%20the%202008%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20%2B105%20kg">Weightlifting at the 2008 Summer Olympics</a> finishing 8th with a total of 413 kg.
At the <a href="2009%20European%20Weightlifting%20Championships">2009 European Championships</a> he won bronze medals in <a href="snatch%20%28weightlifting%29">snatch</a> and <a href="clean%20and%20jerk">clean and jerk</a>, and overall silver in the +105 kg category, with a total of 418 kg.
At the <a href="2012%20Summer%20Olympics">2012 Summer Olympics</a>, he again finished in 8th.
At the <a href="2016%20Summer%20Olympics">2016 Summer Olympics</a>, he finished 9th in the super-heavyweight weight class.
